metadata.title: CVE-2016-2381 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium
metadata.description:
Perl might allow context-dependent attackers to bypass the taint protectionmechanism in a child process via duplicate environment variables in envp.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2016-2381` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libperl5.22 - 5.22.1-8
perl - 5.22.1-8
perl-base - 5.22.1-8
perl-debug - 5.22.1-8
perl-modules-5.22 - 5.22.1-8
No subscription required

criterions.comment: perl package in xenial, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '5.22.1-8').
